title: Legendary Fairmont Majesty in the Heart of Banff National Park
description: Stay in one of the world’s most iconic and historic hotels in Banff, an iconic Canadian resort town surrounded by 6,500sqm of striking parkland and soaring mountainous backdrops. Wild country meets world-famous luxury at the 130-year-old Fairmont Banff Springs, where you’ll enjoy an opulent escape with daily buffet or a la carte breakfast and a CAD$50 food and beverage credit. Upgrades to the exclusive Fairmont Gold Lounge are available.
offer_address: 405 Spray Ave, Banff, AB T1L 1J4, Canada

title: Banff Alpine Majesty in National Park with Two Golf Courses, Nine Restaurants & Onsite Bowling Alley
description:
Experience the grandeur of the Canadian Rockies at this heritage retreat. This castle-like resort is a stunning blend of timeless elegance and natural beauty, offering guests an unforgettable experience. Explore the surrounding Banff National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site, with its pristine lakes, dense forests and serene alpine landscapes.

For a truly memorable meal, visit the 1888 Chop House, where you can savour prime Alberta beef and fresh seafood, or the Waldhaus Restaurant to sample German-inspired delicacies. Alternatively, relax in the heated outdoor pool, indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the Fairmont Spa or challenge yourself on the renowned Stanley Thompson-designed golf course.
offer_address: 405 Spray Avenue, Banff, Alberta T1L 1J4, Canada
